thread.title: Tale of two hatches: New 2018 Toyota Sienna and 2018 Toyota Yaris unveiled
thread.title_full: Tale of two hatches: New 2018 Toyota Sienna and 2018 Toyota Yaris unveiled

author: Aaron Cole (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Tale of two hatches: New 2018 Toyota Sienna and 2018 Toyota Yaris unveiled
text: Oh, sensibility. How we've missed you. Toyota on Wednesday gave us a glimpse at the next versions of two of its most practical offerings in the lineup, the 2018 Toyota Sienna and the 2018 Toyota Yaris Hatchback. We're the first to admit that neither one gets many hearts racing, but when it comes to brute force responsibility, a minivan and an...
